layer.expression: upper(FacilityName) LIKE upper('%[value]%') OR upper(City) LIKE upper('%[value]%') OR upper(PostalCode) = upper('[value]')
layer.textsearchlabel: Search by facility name, city or postal code:
layer.graphicalsearchlabel: Use one of the graphical search tools to select facilities
